title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\Glossary
name: Glossary
description:
Represents a glossary built from user provided data.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.Glossary

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The resource name of the glossary. Glossary names have the form projects/{project-number-or-id}/locations/{location-id}/glossaries/{glossary-id}.

params.name: data.input_config
params.description: Required. Provides examples to build the glossary from. Total glossary must not exceed 10M Unicode codepoints.

params.name: data.entry_count
params.description: Output only. The number of entries defined in the glossary.

params.name: data.end_time
params.description: Output only. When the glossary creation was finished.
